about_the_game:
"Disc creatures WORLD" is a monster taming RPG featuring over 300 unique creatures! Build your party from the creatures you befriend to battle against those who stand in your way! Discover stories featuring creatures and humans alike!

Welcome to a world where humans and creatures coexist, for better and for worse. Sometimes they work together in harmony, but other times they clash from their differences.

Amid this coexistence, humans developed a groundbreaking technology called "Discs". These discs record a creature’s data, allowing new creatures with identical abilities to be created. Those who master the use of Discs, known as Disc Rangers—"DiscRs" for short—work alongside creatures to solve a wide variety of challenges.

Now it’s your turn to enter the world of a DiscR. Exciting adventures, challenging encounters, and strange creatures await you!

  • Over 300 unique creatures to befriend!

  • Adventure with your party by your side! Enjoy the companion system that lets your favorite creatures follow you.

  • Engage in strategic 3-on-3 battles! Use shared Energy Points to unleash moves!

  • Customize your creatures with moves and skills! You can even use creatures that specialize in powerful finishing moves or reflection-based strategies.

  • The "Shake" system, which transforms creatures with deepened bonds into new forms.

  • Explore a diverse world! Discover hidden maps, secret dungeons, and more.

  • Varied creature-driven events from financial mishaps to ghostly encounters!

  • Plenty of in-game achievements! Collect DisCollCards by befriending creatures!

"Disc creatures WORLD" is a remake of the original "Disc creatures" released in 2016. This new version has been completely reimagined, incorporating systems and features we’ve always dreamed of implementing.

While inspired by RPGs of the early 2000s, the game introduces modern gameplay elements, creating a unique experience. It’s highly recommended for fans of monster taming RPGs and anyone who loves creatures and monsters.

name: Disc Creatures WORLD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 11 / 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: CPU 2GHz or more
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a grand adventure through a world full of mysteries, uncovering ‘Discs’ to collect your own party of creatures! Engage in strategic battles, enjoy an assortment of collectables, and meet unique characters along the way. A monster taming RPG with a blend of nostalgia and novelty!
